spec_data.Name: rubygem-gettext
spec_data.Description:
Ruby-GetText-Package is a GNU GetText-like program for Ruby.
The catalog file(po-file) is same format with GNU GetText.
So you can use GNU GetText tools for maintaining.

This package provides gem for Ruby-Gettext-Package.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 14 Aug 2017 02:01:26 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: RubyGem of Localization Library and Tools for Ruby
